description.en: A structured utility tote designed for commuting and daily use. Features reinforced top handles, an optional shoulder strap, and a roomy interior with organizer pockets for books, tablets, and everyday essentials. OEM/ODM customization available for fabric (including recycled options), size, logo patch, lining, pocket layout, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 多功能通勤托特包，包型挺括，手提加固，并可搭配可拆卸肩带。内部空间充足，适合书本、平板与日常随身物品，并可做更细的收纳分区。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon / canvas-like fabric (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional (if zip-top version)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery / leather patch (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙/类帆布面料（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK（如做拉链口版本）
提手：加固织带提手（可定制）
肩带：可拆卸可调节肩带（可定制）
五金：D 环与挂钩等（电镀颜色可定制）
Logo：织标/胶章/刺绣/皮标（可定制）

en.Organization: Roomy main compartment + inner pockets (optional) + side pocket (optional)
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 主仓 + 内袋（可选）+ 侧袋（可选）
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
